dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of publicly available manual tasks from the recipes domain sourced from AllRecipes, including DIY manual tasks from WikiHow. Each task includes a title, description, list of ingredients/resources and tools, and a sequence of step-by-step instructions, which may or may not be illustrated.
dcterms:title: AllRecipes Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset of DIY manual tasks sourced from WikiHow, included for out-of-domain evaluation. Each task features a title, description, list of resources, and a sequence of step-by-step instructions.
dcterms:title: WikiHow Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset compiled from publicly available manual tasks, including both recipes and DIY projects, featuring titles, descriptions, ingredient lists, and step-by-step instructions.
dcterms:title: Manual Tasks Dataset
